      • setArtifactFileNameSupplier

        public JkJavaProjectPackTasks setArtifactFileNameSupplier(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> artifactFileNameSupplier)
        Specifies how the name of the artifact files will be constructed. Given artifact file name are always structured as XXXXX-classifier.ext, this method acts on the XXXXX part.

      • setChecksumAlgorithms

        public JkJavaProjectPackTasks setChecksumAlgorithms(java.lang.String... algorithms)
        Defines the algorithms to sign the produced artifacts.
        Parameters:
        algorithms - Digest algorithm working on JDK8 platform including md5, sha-1, sha-2 and sha-256
